amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the public information campaign (section 109) from the bill and strike the campaign's $12 million authorization.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 111-475 to strike the public information campaign (section 109) from the bill and strike the campaign's $12 million authorization.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 228 (Roll no. 253).
